about.details:
Established in 2015, Beacon Trusteeship Limited is a debenture trustee offering trustee services in various areas such as Debenture Trustee Services, Security Trustee Services, Trustee to Alternate Investment Fund (AIF), Trustee to ESOP, Securitization Trustee, Bond Trusteeship Services, Escrow Services, Safekeeping and other related services.

The company provides due diligence, custodial services, compliance monitoring, documentation, disclosure, record retention, etc. The company's service list includes:

  • Debenture trusteeship: Assisting the issuing company in the issuance of any type of debenture, including non-convertible debentures.
  • Security trustee for Loans: Appointing an investment manager, holding trust funds for the benefit of the beneficiaries, applying for a registration certificate with SEBI, maintaining books of accounts, maintaining confidentiality in respect of the investments and other matters as per the respective agreements.
  • Alternative Investment Funds: Making timely declarations to the investors, ensuring timely disbursements to the investors, ensuring that the investments in the trust are made in accordance with the agreement, segregation of assets, and ensuring that all transactions are properly accounted for in accordance with the agreement.
  • Securitization and Escrow: Ensuring that transfers from the Escrow account are made only to the designated collection account or other account specified in the formal agreement. Drafting and reviewing the Escrow agreement, setting up the Escrow mechanism, documentation, and timely monitoring.

As of September 30, 2023, the company had 69 employees.

faqs.question: What is the Beacon Trusteeship IPO?
faqs.answer:
Beacon Trusteeship IPO is a SME IPO of 5420000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹32.52 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹60 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on May 28, 2024, and closes on May 30, 2024.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Beacon Trusteeship IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Beacon Trusteeship IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Beacon Trusteeship IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Beacon Trusteeship IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Beacon Trusteeship IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Beacon Trusteeship IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Beacon Trusteeship IPO opens on May 28, 2024 and closes on May 30, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Beacon Trusteeship IPO?
faqs.answer: Beacon Trusteeship IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Beacon Trusteeship IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Beacon Trusteeship IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Beacon Trusteeship IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Beacon Trusteeship IPO will be done on Friday, May 31, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, June 3, 2024. Check the Beacon Trusteeship IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Beacon Trusteeship IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Beacon Trusteeship IPO listing date is on Tuesday, June 4, 2024.
